climbs.name: Gaffer
climbs.fa: Matt Juth / Paul Findley / Bernard Gillett 12/03

content.description:
This is the right bolted route in the backstage. Climb up onto ramp and pull right on to a bizarre slab. Follow this up to bolt four, reach past the crux (tall is good), and trend left to the roof. Avoid the flakes to the right of bolt 5 and 6 as they are hollow. Run it out  (for now) across easy slab (20 feet)and clip the final bolt. Pull out the roof through a fun finger crack (you can place a piece from a good stance) to the anchors.

Other than the currently runout section, the majority of the moves are in the 9/9+ range. It's a little dirty right now from a large flake I removed. As it cleans up it will be worthy of 2 stars.
content.protection:
7 Bolts currently (one more will be installed between 6 and 7).

A medium TCU (Yellow) can be placed just before the top.

content.description:
This is the short bolt route on the west side of the slab. Start from the top of the large pillar, and place a few pieces for the belayer. Climb out and right, and edge up past bolts to the finish of Gaffer. Pull through the finger crack roof to the belay.

There is a short runout 15 feet between the last two bolts. Another will be added to service Gaffer and Best Boy.
content.protection:
A large nut and medium cam for the belay at the base.

4 Bolts (soon to be 5) and an optional yellow TCU for the finish

pathTokens: South Fork of St. Vrain Canyon
